mapper.insert: insert into talarm (sn, send_id, receive_id, kind, status, send_date) values(talarm.nextval, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{kind}, 'MSST01', current_date)
mapper.select: select sn, send_id, receive_id, kind, send_date, status from talarm where receiver = #{userId} and status = 'MSST01' order by send_date desc
